games.title: The Grape Escape
games.description: You play as a grape named Barry, who's seemingly met his end at the dreaded Jam factory. But Barry doesn't go down easily. Escape the Jam Factory in this fast-paced platforming adventure
games.instructions: Move with the arrow keys, jump with spacebar, and interact with Z

games.title: Danger Noodle
games.description: A snake inspired game where the longer you grow, the harder the game gets. Move with WASD or arrow keys and dash with spacebar or shift. Play 6 unique levels across 2 worlds.
games.instructions: Move with WASD or Arrow Keys. Dash with Spacebar or Shift
